xtc.lang.cpp

Class HeaderFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stream

    public class HeaderFileManager
extends Object
implements Stream
    This class manages the lexing of input files as well as finding headers.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.87 $

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HeaderFileManager.Include
      This class abstracts away both a single header and computed headers that have to include several headers in different presenceCondition.
      class  HeaderFileManager.PFile
      A struct to encapsulate the data associated with a regular header.

      Create a new file manager, given the main file reader, the main file object, and the header search paths.

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        public Syntax scan()
            throws IOException
        Get the next token from the base or header file. If we are in a header a see an EOF, we suppress the EOF and instead pop the header stack and resume reading the last file.
        Specified by:
        scan in interface Stream
        Returns:
        the next token.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • done

        public boolean done()
        Determine whether we are at the end of the stream.
        Specified by:
        done in interface Stream
        Returns:
        true if at end of stream.

      • includeHeader

        public Syntax includeHeader(String headerName,
                   boolean sysHeader,
                   boolean includeNext,
                   xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager presenceConditionManager,
                   MacroTable macroTable)
                     throws IOException
        Enter the given header file. Use findHeader to get the qualified header. Also checks for guard macro.
        Returns:
        a start header delimiter if the header exists, otherwise null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • includeComputedHeader

        public Syntax includeComputedHeader(List<String> completed,
                           List<xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager.PresenceCondition> presenceConditions,
                           boolean includeNext,
                           xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager presenceConditionManager,
                           MacroTable macroTable)
        Include computed header(s). Take a list of header names and a list of presence conditions. Note that because macros can be multiply-defined, a single computed include directive may expand to several possible header filenames.
        Parameters:
        completed - the list of computed includes.
        presenceConditions - the list of presence conditions in which the computed includes are valid.
        includeNext - whether the computed include was an #include_next directive.
        presenceConditionManager - the presence condition manager.
        macroTable - the macro symbol table.
        Returns:
        the start include delimiter if the header exists, null otherwise.

      • getSize

        public long getSize()
        Return the total size of the main file and headers.
        Returns:
        The total size.
